statements.query: MATCH (:AzureResourceGroup)<-[r:RESOURCE_GROUP]-(:AzureNetworkInterface)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureNetworkInterface)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureNetworkInterface)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzurePublicIPAddress)<-[r:MEMBER_PUBLIC_IP_ADDRESS]-(:AzureNetworkInterface)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureNetworkSecurityGroup)<-[r:MEMBER_NETWORK_SECURITY_GROUP]-(:AzureNetworkInterface)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: cleanup Azure network interfaces related resources
